item.title: SilkAir will enhance Singapore Airlines' offerings to Male
item.description:
Source: SilkAir. Male. Starting October 25, 2015, SilkAir, the regional subsidiary of Singapore Airlines, will introduce four weekly flights to Male, Maldives. Previously, Singapore Airlines operated between 10 and 14 flights per week to Male. With the addition of SilkAir’s new flights, the two airlines will jointly offer two daily round trips, pending regulatory approval. Lee Wen Fen, Singapore Airlines’ Senior Vice President of Marketing Planning, highlighted the benefits of this collaboration: “By coordinating the networks of both carriers, we can provide our customers with more choices and flexibility when planning their travel...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/silkair-will-enhance-singapore-airlines-offerings-to-male/

item.title: Men's cufflinks that can be customized are now offered on Indiegogo
item.description:
CuffloCs, customizable cufflinks designed for men, are seeking funding on Indiegogo. These unique cufflinks feature a secure compartment for holding small items. According to creator Josh Jablonski, CuffloCs can accommodate a variety of small objects, such as jewelry charms, pebbles, or even photographs. Source: Indiegogo. “The screw/on off design ensures the security of your items within the double-sided glass, and the cufflink can be effortlessly disassembled to switch up the design,” explains Jablonski on his Indiegogo page...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/men-s-cufflinks-that-can-be-customized-are-now-offered-on-indiegogo/
